package example_test

import (
	"testing"

	"github.com/pingcap/tidb/testkit/marker"
)

func TestMarkAsFeature(t *testing.T) {
	marker.As(t, marker.Feature, "FD-1", "FD-1 feature testing")
}

func TestMarkAsIssue(t *testing.T) {
	marker.As(t, marker.Issue, 12345)
}

func TestMarkMixes(t *testing.T) {
	marker.As(t, marker.Feature, "FD-1", "FD-1 feature testing")
	t.Logf("FD-1 feature testing")

	marker.As(t, marker.Issue, 12345)
	t.Logf("fix issue 12345 testing")

	marker.As(t, marker.Feature, "FD-1", "FD-1 feature testing")
	t.Logf("FD-1 feature testing again")

	marker.As(t, marker.Feature, "FD-2", "FD-2 feature testing")
	t.Logf("FD-2 feature testing")

	marker.As(t, marker.Issue, 12346)
	t.Logf("fix issue 12346 testing")
}
